00032 TRawAnalysis::TRawAnalysis()
00033 {
00034   cout << "TRawAnalysis::TRawAnalysis()" << endl;
00035 #ifdef STANDALONE
00036   MCaenCompProcessRaw_init();  // standalone
00037   MTDC400ProcessRaw_init();  // standalone
00038 #endif
00039   
00040   // Create raw data objects
00041   gData->CaenComp = new TCaenCompData;
00042   gData->StackedTDC400 = new TStackedTDC400Data;
00043   // Make a reader for each pad.
00044   for(int ipad=0; ipad<tpc_parameters.kNPads; ipad++) {
00045     int crate = tpc_parameters.GetWFDCrate(ipad);
00046     int slot = tpc_parameters.GetWFDSlot(ipad);
00047     int ch = tpc_parameters.GetWFDChannel(ipad);
00048     // Could check Channel enabled here
00049     int dbc = tpc_parameters.GetWFDDBC(crate,slot,ch);
00050     int personality = tpc_parameters.GetWFDPersonality(crate,slot,ch);
00051     string bankname = tpc_parameters.Pad2WFDBankName(ipad);
00052     gData->fTPCWFDBanks.push_back(TWFDBankReader(dbc,personality,bankname));
00053   }
00054   
00055   // Make the TTPCIslandManager. Don't fill anything yet. 
00056   // The constructor looks at the number of pads, so it's
00057   // important that TParametersAnalysis has already been constructed.
00058   gData->fTPCIslands = new TTPCIslandManager();
00059 
00060   // Make the Ge Det. bank readers
00061   vector<TOctalFADCBankReader>& vGeFADCBanks = gData->fGeFADCBanks;
00062   for(int i=0; i<8; i++){
00063     char name[8];
00064     sprintf(name,"N%cfe", 'a'+i);
00065     vGeFADCBanks.push_back(TOctalFADCBankReader(name));
00066   }
00067 
00068 #ifdef RUN9
00069   gData->NeutronBank = new TNeutronRaw;
00070 #endif
00071 }
00072 
00073 TRawAnalysis::~TRawAnalysis()
00074 {
00075   printf("Destructor TRawAnalysis()\n");
00076 
00077   delete gData->StackedTDC400;
00078   delete gData->CaenComp;
00079   delete gData->fTPCIslands;
00080 #ifdef RUN9
00081   delete gData->NeutronBank;
00082 #endif
00083 }
00084 
00085 INT TRawAnalysis::ProcessEvent(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00086 {
00087 #ifdef STANDALONE
00088   MCaenCompProcessRaw(pheader, pevent); // standalone
00089   MTDC400ProcessRaw(pheader, pevent); // standalone
00090 #endif
00091   gData->CaenComp->ProcessEvent(pheader, pevent);
00092   gData->StackedTDC400->ProcessEvent(pheader, pevent);
00093   
00094   // Each bank reader needs to process its bank
00095   for(int ipad=0; ipad<tpc_parameters.kNPads; ipad++) {
00096     gData->fTPCWFDBanks.at(ipad).ProcessEvent(pheader,pevent);
00097   }
00098 
00099   //Now import islands into TTPCIslandManager, specializing them for the TPC
00100   gData->fTPCIslands->ProcessEvent();
00101 
00102   // Process bank readers
00103   for(int i=0; i<gData->fGeFADCBanks.size(); ++i){
00104     gData->fGeFADCBanks[i].ProcessEvent(pheader, pevent);
00105   }
00106 
00107   // Create GeDet Islands out of the neutron pulses
00108     
00109 
00110 #ifdef RUN9
00111 
00112   gData->NeutronBank->Clear();
00113 
00114   gData->NeutronBank->ProcessEvent(pheader, pevent);
00115 
00116 #endif
00117 
00118   return SUCCESS;
00119 }
